sql: SELECT MIN(an1.name) AS costume_designer_pseudo, MIN(t.title) AS movie_with_costumes FROM aka_name AS an1, cast_info AS ci, company_name AS cn, movie_companies AS mc, name AS n1, role_type AS rt, title AS t WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]' AND rt.role ='costume designer' AND an1.person_id = n1.id AND n1.id = ci.person_id AND ci.movie_id = t.id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND mc.company_id = cn.id AND ci.role_id = rt.id AND an1.person_id = ci.person_id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(n1 an1 ci t mc cn rt)
 HashJoin(n1 an1 ci t mc cn)
 MergeJoin(an1 ci t mc cn)
 HashJoin(an1 ci t mc)
 HashJoin(an1 ci t)
 HashJoin(an1 ci)
 TidScan(n1)
 BitmapScan(an1)
 BitmapScan(ci)
 SeqScan(t)
 SeqScan(mc)
 BitmapScan(cn)
 BitmapScan(rt)
 Leading(((n1 ((((an1 ci) t) mc) cn)) rt)) */
